drgflares.config.noSourceDecayTime: How fast in ticks light sources with no entity are removed. Lower values are faster. 20 ticks = 1 second, 1200 ticks = 1 minute, 72000 ticks = 1 hour
drgflares.config.flareQuantity: How many flares a single player can hold.
drgflares.config.flareReplenishTime: Time it takes for a flare to be replenished back to the pile. Lower values are faster. 20 ticks = 1 second, 1200 ticks = 1 minute, 72000 ticks = 1 hour
drgflares.config.flareReplenishQuantity: How many flares are replenished per replenish cycle.
drgflares.config.lightDecayTime: How long in ticks light sources will last. Lower values are faster. 20 ticks = 1 second, 1200 ticks = 1 minute, 72000 ticks = 1 hour
drgflares.config.entityDecayTime: How long in ticks until the entity will despawn after the light has gone out. Lower values are faster. 20 ticks = 1 second, 1200 ticks = 1 minute, 72000 ticks = 1 hour
drgflares.config.bounceModifier: Bounce dampening modifier. Higher numbers = less bounce.
drgflares.config.flareGravity: How much movement is removed from the entity over time in the Y direction. AKA GRAVITY! Higher = thicc flares
drgflares.config.hitEntityGlows: If the thrown flare hits an entity, it will break and make them glow.
drgflares.config.lightBlockDebug: If for whatever reason you are having issues with the invisible lights doing odd stuff enable this to see them.
drgflares.config.displayFlareCount: Display the count of flares currently stored on the player in the HUD.
drgflares.config.makeNoiseWhenThrown: If flares make a noise when thrown.
drgflares.config.entityGlowingTime: How long flares cause entities to glow when hit.
drgflares.config.spectatorsRequiredToGen: If spectators need to generate flares to throw them like a regular player.
drgflares.config.flareRotationStrength: How strongly rotation is applied to flares. Too high and they get glitchy, too low and they don't rotate much at all.
drgflares.config.flareCoreColor: Default color of flare cores for all players, accepts hex only. NOTE: Incorrect colors will default to #c334eb!
